formulas.name: Complex Number
formulas.description: Standard form of complex number, a = real part, b = imaginary part

formulas.name: Conjugate
formulas.description: Reflection of z about real axis

formulas.name: Modulus
formulas.description: Distance from origin in complex plane

formulas.name: Argument
formulas.description: Angle with positive real axis. Must check quadrant! Q1: θ, Q2: π−θ, Q3: −π+θ, Q4: −θ

formulas.name: Polar Form
formulas.description: r = |z|, θ = arg(z). Euler's form: re^(iθ)

formulas.name: De Moivre's Theorem
formulas.description: Powerful tool for computing powers of complex numbers and finding nth roots
formulas.use_case: Finding cube roots of unity, nth roots of any complex number

formulas.name: Modulus-Conjugate Relation
formulas.description: Product of complex number and its conjugate equals modulus squared

formulas.name: Triangle Inequality
formulas.description: Both upper and lower bounds for modulus of sum

formulas.name: Discriminant
formulas.description: D > 0: distinct real roots, D = 0: equal roots, D < 0: complex conjugate roots

formulas.name: Vieta's Formula (Sum of Roots)
formulas.description: Sum of roots of quadratic ax² + bx + c = 0

formulas.name: Sum of Squares of Roots
formulas.description: Express symmetric functions of roots using Vieta's formulas

formulas.name: Maximum/Minimum of Quadratic
formulas.formula: Extreme value at x = −b/2a, value = (4ac − b²)/4a
